name: SpaceBomb (Pandaa2610)
description:
Step 1: Destroy Asteroids

Step 2: Get enough PowerUp.

Step 3: BOOM!

Step 4: Repeat until no one can beat your score.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Aim & Shoot: Mouse


Have Fun!

----------------------

The  Highscore list and the option menu is missing in this build and will be fixed later.

Played best in small window mode.

Tip: Turn your volume down :)
